programme.desc: After everyone banded together to paint the society, they were all extremely impressed by the end result.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The Satyanarayana Pooja was a huge success and now, everyone is eagerly waiting for the evening party.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Instead of the usual dance party, Champaklal has decided that this time the celebrations would include 'Bhajans' to sh.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena is conflicted when Bhide does not allow him to gather funds for the festival. Meanwhile, Taarak meets his fans and takes pictures with them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When the society does not have enough funds to celebrate the 'Ganesh Utsav', Tapu Sena comes up with a clever plan.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena and other members of the society welcome Lord Ganesha to Gokuldham society amidst great decoration and music.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The members of the society are impressed with Tapu Sena's decorations. Later, Taarak gives an inspirational message.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena organises a talent show in society. However, the members are worried about the 'murga' punishment.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal is very worried about getting the punishment. Later, he makes a deal with Popatlal, who is also nervous.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While Bhide and Hathi's performance impresses every member of the society, Popatlal gets a tricky task from Tapu Sena.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Taarak gets a task to recite poetry, he renders a beautiful piece about the members. Later, Champaklal suddenly disappears.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha's performance impresses every member of Gokuldham society. Later, Abdul also gives an entertaining performance.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: Monty sees some goons kidnap his friend Annie and follows the kidnappers at a distance on his cycle. Meanwhile, Team CID discover the corpse of Annie's mother in her house.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: While trying to find a missing girl, Team CID realise that her colleagues are lying. Later, the office building collapses, almost killing Daya and reveals a mysterious tunnel below the structure.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The tattoo artist tricks the scammer into getting him to the studio.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Members of Gokuldham take Babban to Madhavi for identification. Later, everyone is shocked when Inspector Pandey arrives at the society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when Dr Hathi arrives in a tempo and is unable to get off of it. Later, Babita gets excited about her birthday but gets disappointed when Iyer cannot celebrate with her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Babita learns that Iyer and all her loved ones are busy on her birthday, she feels upset. On the same day, Jethalal rushes to get a nice present for Babita when he assumes it is her birthday.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal reaches Babita's house to wish her assuming it is her birthday. However, chaos ensues when he leaks Iyer's surprise plans for her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal rushes to learn western dance forms when he learns about Babita's birthday party. Later, Daya feels devastated when the ladies of Gokuldham inform her about the party's invitation card.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: As Babita's western birthday party approaches, the residents of Gokuldham Society begin preparing for the big day. Meanwhile, Jethalal gets unhappy when he does not receive the invitation card.

programme.title: The Kapil Sharma Show
programme.desc: Sunny Deol and Ameesha Patel make a guest appearance to promote their film. Later, Ameesha regales the audience with a humorous anecdote, eliciting laughter from all present.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After hearing about Popatlal's scary experience, the Gokuldham Society members devise a plan to scare off flat buyers.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide accompanies the prospective buyers to Mohanlal's apartment. However, something strange makes all of them run for their lives.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The ghost tells the society members that she will not leave until she gets married. Left without an option, the members call a ghostbuster.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Iyer believes that Babita is not in love with him after they meet face-to-face; Iyer's friends stay put at Popatlal's house and wait for Iyer's explanation.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Iyer, devastated by his love life, shares his problems with his friends and asks for advice on how to deal with his broken heart.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal talks to Babita to identify the main reason for Iyer and Babita's broken relationship without mentioning Iyer's name.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: At Gada Electronics, Jethalal organises a secret meeting to save Babita and Iyer's marriage. Babita nearly interrupts the gathering, but Bagha and Jethalal prevent this.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The men of Gokuldham plan to make Babita jealous and help her reconcile with Iyer by having him pretend to propose to Sweety.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and his friends urge Iyer to act like he is cheating on Babita. Iyer meets up with Sweety at a mall where all the women hang out.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sweety's boyfriend catches Iyer and Sweety pretending to be lovers and beats up Iyer. Iyer and Sweety continue with their plan.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Gopu Sena from 7 Star Society challenges Tapu Sena that their Ganesh Chaturthi event will win the award. Meanwhile, Bhide disagrees to provide funds to Tapu Sena for this event.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After a bank refuses a loan request, Tapu Sena approaches a moneylender to facilitate their event. Later, they have to pay a high price for it.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena finally unveils the Ganpati decorations, and everyone is breathless by the setup. Meanwhile, They also have a second surprise to reveal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: All members of Gokuldham society pay their respects to Lord Ganesha. Later, everyone is excited to receive delightful gifts.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Gokuldham society wins the best Ganesh Chaturthi event award. Everyone is excited to hear the news.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena realises the folly of spending money that could use to help someone who is in need. Later, they apologise to everyone.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.desc: All of the members go on a trip to visit Mumbai's famous Shree Siddhivinayak Ganapati Temple. Meanwhile, Bhide announces a surprise that he plans for everyone. He also apologises for the day before.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The members of the society return home to another surprise from Bhide. However, a new problem suddenly arises.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Panic arrives when Jethalal loses his house key, and everyone in the society helps him find the key. All of the members are tired, but they still cannot find the keys.
